mapper.select: /* cherro ::: 완성2 */ /* 방문건 */ SELECT DISTINCT '202305' AS ASN_OJ_YM -- #{배정년월} , t1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , t1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , t1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD AS SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD , ( SELECT MAX(zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' AND zz.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND zz.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND zz.VST_DV_CD <> '20'-- 배송 이외 (방문) ) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , t2.WK_PSIC_DV_CD AS MNGR_DV_CD -- LISTAGG(zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC) OVER (PARTITION BY zz.CNTR_NO, zz.CNTR_SN) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- , ( -- SELECT LISTAGG(temp1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,',') -- FROM ( -- SELECT zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz -- WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO -- AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN -- AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 -- ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC -- ) temp1 -- ) AS RLTD_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , ( SELECT LISTAGG(zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC) OVER (PARTITION BY zz.CNTR_NO, zz.CNTR_SN) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 AND zz.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND zz.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND zz.VST_DV_CD <> '20'-- 배송 이외 (방문) ) AS RLTD_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- , ( -- SELECT LISTAGG(temp2.CD_CNTN,'/') -- FROM ( -- SELECT DISTINCT zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, xx.CD_CNTN -- FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz -- , T_CMZ_CD_D xx -- WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO -- AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN -- AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 -- AND xx.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' -- AND xx.CD_ID = 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD' -- AND xx.CD_VLD_VAL = zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC -- ) temp2 -- ) AS CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN , ( SELECT -- DISTINCT zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, xx.CD_CNTN LISTAGG(xx.CD_CNTN, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC) OVER (PARTITION BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, xx.CD_CNTN) AS CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz , T_CMZ_CD_D xx WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 AND zz.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND zz.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND zz.VST_DV_CD <> '20'-- 배송 이외 (방문) AND xx.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND xx.CD_ID = 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD' AND xx.CD_VLD_VAL = zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ) AS CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN , t3.ADR_ID AS ADR_ID , '' AS LSTMM_CRDOVR_YN , '' AS BF_VST_DUEDT , t2.PDCT_PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD , t1.IST_NMN_N AS IST_NMN_N , t1.VST_NMN_N AS VST_NMN_N , DECODE(t1.VST_DV_CD,'12','Y','13','Y','N') AS EGER_WK_YN , t1.VST_DUEDT AS VST_DUEDT , (CASE WHEN '202305' > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(t2.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),FRISU_AS_PTRM_N),'YYYYMMDD')-- #{배정년월} THEN '2' ELSE '1' END)AS AS_REFRI_DV_CD , '1' AS BFSVC_REFRI_DV_CD , t1.VST_DV_CD AS VST_DV_CD , '' AS SPC_AS_TP_CD , '' AS CST_SV_ASN_NO , 'N' AS DTA_DL_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ t1 , TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ t2 , TB_SVPD_SV_HSHD_NO_OJ_IZ t3 , TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL t4 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.CNTR_NO = t2.CNTR_NO AND t1.CNTR_SN = t2.CNTR_SN AND t1.CNTR_NO = t3.CNTR_NO AND t1.CNTR_SN = t3.CNTR_SN AND t1.CNTR_NO = t4.CNTR_NO AND t1.CNTR_SN = t4.CNTR_SN AND t2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' AND t2.BFSVC_SPP_STP_RSON_CD IN ('00','01') AND t1.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{파라미터} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 AND ( ( SELECT count(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ zz WHERE zz.ASN_OJ_YM = '202305' -- 파라미터 AND zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DV_CD = t1.VST_DV_CD ) = 0 ) -- 배정이 안된 건만 AND t1.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND t1.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND t1.VST_DV_CD <> '20'-- 배송 이외 (방문) UNION ALL /* 배송건 */ SELECT DISTINCT '202305' AS ASN_OJ_YM -- #{배정년월} , t1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , t1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , t1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD AS SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD , ( SELECT MAX(zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' AND zz.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND zz.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND zz.VST_DV_CD = '20'-- 배송건 ) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- , NVL(MAX(WK_SN),0)+1 AS WK_SN -- WK_SN은 INSERT 할때 max+1 처리 , t2.WK_PSIC_DV_CD AS MNGR_DV_CD -- , ( -- SELECT LISTAGG(SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,',') -- FROM ( -- SELECT SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz -- WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO -- AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN -- AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 -- ORDER BY SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC -- ) -- ) AS RLTD_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- , ( -- SELECT LISTAGG(CD_CNTN,',') -- FROM ( -- SELECT DISTINCT SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, CD_CNTN -- FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz -- , T_CMZ_CD_D xx -- WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO -- AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN -- AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 -- AND xx.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' -- AND xx.CD_ID = 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD' -- AND xx.CD_VLD_VAL = zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD -- ORDER BY SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC -- ) -- ) AS CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN , ( SELECT LISTAGG(zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC) OVER (PARTITION BY zz.CNTR_NO, zz.CNTR_SN) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 AND zz.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND zz.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND zz.VST_DV_CD = '20'-- 배송건 ) AS RLTD_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , ( SELECT LISTAGG(xx.CD_CNTN, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ASC) OVER (PARTITION BY zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, xx.CD_CNTN) AS CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ zz , T_CMZ_CD_D xx WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{배정년월} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 AND zz.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND zz.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND zz.VST_DV_CD = '20'-- 배송건 AND xx.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND xx.CD_ID = 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD' AND xx.CD_VLD_VAL = zz.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ) AS CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN , t3.ADR_ID AS ADR_ID , '' AS LSTMM_CRDOVR_YN , '' AS BF_VST_DUEDT , t2.PDCT_PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD , t1.IST_NMN_N AS IST_NMN_N , t1.VST_NMN_N AS VST_NMN_N , DECODE(t1.VST_DV_CD,'12','Y','13','Y','N') AS EGER_WK_YN , t1.VST_DUEDT AS VST_DUEDT , (CASE WHEN '202305' > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(t2.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),FRISU_AS_PTRM_N),'YYYYMMDD')-- #{배정년월} THEN '2' ELSE '1' END)AS AS_REFRI_DV_CD , '1' AS BFSVC_REFRI_DV_CD , t1.VST_DV_CD AS VST_DV_CD , '' AS SPC_AS_TP_CD , '' AS CST_SV_ASN_NO , 'N' AS DTA_DL_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ t1 , TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ t2 , TB_SVPD_SV_HSHD_NO_OJ_IZ t3 , TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL t4 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.CNTR_NO = t2.CNTR_NO AND t1.CNTR_SN = t2.CNTR_SN AND t1.CNTR_NO = t3.CNTR_NO AND t1.CNTR_SN = t3.CNTR_SN AND t1.CNTR_NO = t4.CNTR_NO AND t1.CNTR_SN = t4.CNTR_SN AND t2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' AND t2.BFSVC_SPP_STP_RSON_CD IN ('00','01') AND t1.VST_DUEDT LIKE '202305%' -- #{파라미터} + '%' 처리. 해당 컬럼 인덱스 예정 AND ( ( SELECT count(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ zz WHERE zz.ASN_OJ_YM = '202305' -- 파라미터 AND zz.CNTR_NO = t1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = t1.CNTR_SN AND zz.VST_DV_CD = t1.VST_DV_CD ) = 0 ) -- 배정이 안된 건만 AND t1.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND t1.WK_DT IS NULL -- 작업처리 되지 않은 건 AND t1.VST_DV_CD = '20'-- 배송건
